name: Time Weaver
description:
Time Weaver is a short narrative game where you move Pilgrim, an experiment kept in a lab. Your powers are being tested - your touch moves objects back and forth in their timeline, like a selective time-travel. Your left hand rewinds time, your right hand fast-forwards it.

Who are you? Are you the only experiment in the lab? What did you do - or what are you about to do? Use your powers and put together the clues to sort out the story!

Help us out! Add your level!

The game as it is now is the skeleton structure of a potentially very longer series of puzzle to solve. How would you use these powers to create new levels? What combinations can you think of? Just write us everything - and we’ll add YOUR level to the game!

Team

Concept & Coding Michelangelo Alesi

Sound design Nicolo Traini

Story & Graphics Leda Baol

3D models created by Quaternius,
distributed under Public Domain license (CC0)
Typeface "Mattone" by Collletttivo,
distributed under SIL Open Font License Version 1.1

This game was originally uploaded for the GameDev.tv Community Jam 1-31 May 2020 "Time"

Average playtime: 15 minutes
